### (a)

 Create two simple linear regression models, one using $x_1$ as the independent variable and the other
using $x_2$. The dependent variable is games won ($y$). Report the estimated regression equation for each
model and test each model for significance of the slope parameter. The hypothesis test should contain
your test statistic, critical value, p-value, decision, and conclusion (in the context of the problem).

```{r, echo=TRUE}
mod_1 <- lm(y ~ x1)
mod_2 <- lm(y ~ x2)
```
